tasks.label: Workspace: Install
tasks.command: python -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && npm install

windows.command: python -m venv .venv; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; npm install

if (Test-Path .venv) { Remove-Item .venv -Recurse -Force }; if (Test-Path node_modules) { Remove-Item node_modules -Recurse -Force }; Remove-Item backend/__pycache__, backend/itsor/__pycache__ -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

$portPids = @(netstat -ano | Select-String ':8000' | ForEach-Object { (($_ -split '\s+')[-1]) } | Where-Object { $_ -match '^[0-9]+$' } | Sort-Object -Unique); foreach ($processId in $portPids) { Stop-Process -Id $processId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; exit 0
